titleInfo.title: Iroquois Steeplechase at Percy Warner Park, Nashville, Tennessee, 1953

location.physicalLocation: Metropolitan Nashville/Davidson County Archives, Nashville Public Library

mods.abstract: A close-up of Nashville Mayor Ben West (wearing a hat) and Mrs. West with some of their friends at the 1953 Iroquois Memorial Steeplechase held at Percy Warner Park in Nashville, Tennessee. The first Iroquois Steeplechase, named for the famed Belle Meade stallion, was run in 1941. It has been held annually, except in 1945, due to World War II. Forms part of Record Group 3, Metro Davidson County Photographer. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.

titleInfo.title: Record Group 3 Metro Davidson County Photographer
